channel.title: Click (feat. Eric C. Powell) - darwinmcd [Single]
channel.description:
Hello fellow Auxians!
Been away for a while, but back to tell you I’ve been busy working on a new single that was released today callled “Click”, featuring vocals by a good friend of mine, Eric C. Powell. Eric also added some additional instrumentation to my original Auxy demo (and mastered the final mix).
If you want to check it out and let me know what you think, here’s a link to a page with links to all of the digital outlets “Click” has been distributed to:
http://smarturl.it/ecp-click
The single contains the vocal mix, a “voxless” mix, and my original Auxy demo mix. ![image|500x500](upload://ngrm35Tx5vKLxXRbbxM1Alntopd.jpeg)
Hope you enjoy and would love to know what you think!
darwinmcd

item.title: Click (feat. Eric C. Powell) - darwinmcd [Single]
item.dc:creator: darwinmcd
item.description:
Hello fellow Auxians!

Been away for a while, but back to tell you I’ve been busy working on a new single that was released today callled “Click”, featuring vocals by a good friend of mine, Eric C. Powell. Eric also added some additional instrumentation to my original Auxy demo (and mastered the final mix).

If you want to check it out and let me know what you think, here’s a link to a page with links to all of the digital outlets “Click” has been distributed to:

smarturl.it

Click by DarwinMcD (feat. Eric C. Powell)

Click is a collaboration of DarwinMcD and Eric C. Powell. Think synthpop goodness with a fresh edge.

The single contains the vocal mix, a “voxless” mix, and my original Auxy demo mix.

Hope you enjoy and would love to know what you think!

darwinmcd
